name: Reflection on Mars
description:
Reflection on Mars is a minimalist survival game with a reflection mecanic.

Control: 

Use the mouse 

Credit: 

Programming: Dorian Sanjivy 

Sound Effect: Dorian Sanjivy (Mouth)

Cover Image : Abel Graux

Made for the Mini Jam 121 (Reflection)

Story: 

Each dome has a complex and unforeseen malfunction: they lack windows, which means that food cannot grow. 

Faced with this, humanity has begun to die out and only one colony remains. Fortunately, there arises a hero (it's you OMG): Jean Velux, a master glazier/mirrorier who used his science to fix windows to the shelters. 

It's up to you to bring humanity back to life by streaming sunlight through the dome of mirrors. You will also have to fight aliens who didn't ask you anything and who live their quiet life, but too bad for them, they are green and the gameplay had to be fleshed out, so sorry.
